import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Login = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const { login, loginWithMicrosoft, isAuthenticated, error } = useAuth(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [msLoading, setMsLoading] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); // すでに認証されている場合はダッシュボードへリダイレクト if (isAuthenticated) { return ; } const onSubmit = async (data) => { setLoading(true); const success = await login(data.username, data.password); setLoading(false); if (success) { navigate('/'); } }; const handleMicrosoftLogin = async () => { setMsLoading(true); const success = await loginWithMicrosoft(); setMsLoading(false); if (success) { navigate('/'); } }; return (
